name: places/ChIJd7NNxSVawokRsYSdw-43pGA
formattedAddress: 43 Catherine St, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 43 Catherine St, New York, NY 10038-1346, USA

originalText.text: Besides the junkies and the pan handlers their deli is quite good. I usually get the lamb over rice as they have a wide assortment of toppings to put on your plate.

text.text: Besides the junkies and the pan handlers their deli is quite good. I usually get the lamb over rice as they have a wide assortment of toppings to put on your plate.

originalText.text: The most authentic deli experience I’ve ever had. Their chopped cheese is not just a burger patty like every other NYC deli, their beef is fresh and you can taste it. The young man who works there is really nice and patient and makes your experience way better.

text.text: The most authentic deli experience I’ve ever had. Their chopped cheese is not just a burger patty like every other NYC deli, their beef is fresh and you can taste it. The young man who works there is really nice and patient and makes your experience way better.

originalText.text: Chopped Cheese is very good. Price is good also. Had to update this.. lamb over rice for $7.99... better than I have had for $30.  The men that run the shop are salt-of-the-earth. I will be back often.

text.text: Chopped Cheese is very good. Price is good also. Had to update this.. lamb over rice for $7.99... better than I have had for $30.  The men that run the shop are salt-of-the-earth. I will be back often.

originalText.text: Do not come to this store! The workers are very rude! Especially the guy at the cashier. One time when I went to this store I had my last dollar on me. I got myself a bag of chips so I gave the guy my dollar then he flicks my dollar down to the floor. He didn't even want the money but he took it from me anyway just to waste it. Then another time I went to get myself chips on my EBT card. I only had a dollar left on my card. The Chips was $2.00. So he takes the chips and starts eating them in front of me and tells me that my card has been declined. I am so angry because I always give them business. I am never coming back again!!!

text.text: Do not come to this store! The workers are very rude! Especially the guy at the cashier. One time when I went to this store I had my last dollar on me. I got myself a bag of chips so I gave the guy my dollar then he flicks my dollar down to the floor. He didn't even want the money but he took it from me anyway just to waste it. Then another time I went to get myself chips on my EBT card. I only had a dollar left on my card. The Chips was $2.00. So he takes the chips and starts eating them in front of me and tells me that my card has been declined. I am so angry because I always give them business. I am never coming back again!!!

originalText.text: This place used to be absolutely amazing, there was this older gentleman that worked behind the counter and a middle aged one who were  so kind and would make jokes with you and  generally made the whole experience 10x better with the homey vibe they had but since the two left the new staff are incredibly rude and disrespectful. I do get and have worked in customer service in the past so I understand sometimes people have rough days and sometimes we just get them on an off day. I don't even expect ever for a staff member at an establishment to be the picture perfect example  of 'the customer is always right'. As long as I get my food and get my change we're all good! But the people here forget your order, take a full 30 minutes on a butter bagel, change prices at random and the place is now so dirty.  There's also a group of old men and people who are high or drunk always standing around gossiping in the mornings. But if you need to quickly go get a bag of chips or a drink they have a good selection of that as well as some sweet packaged items, stay away from their ice creams they're really overpriced but everything else is priced reasonably.
